author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix corruption when we have multiple usefarmer's without a count.
(run_farm): If we don't see a count attribute, increment by one.

author: danielf
msg: Create the Avalon context localy and use the current servlet context instead of using the Avalon context from the container that not has any knowledge about the current servlet context.

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-941: Commit Narayanan's statementeventlisteners_embedded_v2.diff patch, implementing embedded support for JDBC4 statement event listening.

author: blautenb
msg: - Provide --enable-warnerror to stop compile on warnings
- Add -I${XALANCROOT}/include to input to allow definition of installed
xalan package as well as src package

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Update flood site to point at svn.apache.org URLs instead of busted CVS ones.
